Reviews.Title: does not work on 3G network movistar Venezuela
Reviews.Author: Andrys mayor
Reviews.Content: I think it's great, I'm from Venezuela unfortunately does not work with 3G network movistar, should include a list of operators with which it works properly.

Reviews.Title: its ok.
Reviews.Author: jaison
Reviews.Content: the phone its good, really fast, came with a 2gb sd memory and only english, but the t-mobile doesnt work 3G movistar venezuela, should have known before the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Product not as published
Reviews.Author: djsn33
Reviews.Content: The cellphone arrived with its trackpad damaged, it was supposed to work in 1,2,5,6 bands and it doesn't, it works in 1,4,8 bands so I received a 3G phone not working with my carrier. Amazon shoud be more careful about publishing accurate product description, regarding to cellphones it is critical information.

Reviews.Title: Cell Lounge SUCKS!
Reviews.Author: sheri
Reviews.Content: This is the worse phone distributor I have ever encountered, stay away from this company, it took 2 weeks to recieve my phone and it is a faulty cell phone, they promised a replacement if I removed my negative review, which I did, it has been a month since they promised to replace the phone, still no replacement.

Reviews.Title: venta muy mala
Reviews.Author: pedro "pedroherreram"
Reviews.Content: compre este equipo gsm y al recibirlo me entregaron uno cdma y ahora no lo puedo usar pues en venezuela no homologan lineas cdma traidas del extranjero, eso es una falta de respeto a los compradores.

Reviews.Title: BB Curve Unlock Graphite Grey
Reviews.Author: Frigging upset
Reviews.Content: I paid for a Grey phone and got a black.  What the hell is wrong with you people.  I paid for a brand new phone and got a phone in a plastic bag with no headset and no manual.  You just lost one customer with your lies and deception.

Reviews.Title: The cellphone looks like old
Reviews.Author: Waltersog
Reviews.Content: Ok, I want to start with a good review becauase the Cellphone works fine, but the cellphone looks like old, when I put in the battery the surface was like rusty and I have to press the keys with difficulty, I'm not happy with the buy but I can't do anything because I live in Colombia.

Reviews.Title: Amazon giving fake information about warranty
Reviews.Author: ses
Reviews.Content: This phone do not come with any type of waaranty. But before purchase, amazon confirmed that it has an international warranty. When enquired about this to amazon after the purchase, they replied that BB will give the warranty, but when contacted BB they told phones purchased from amazon do not have any warranty on it. i did not use the phone so far, but the device do not look brand new as they tell. had lot of dust and the packing box looks really old. Not satisfied with amazons service.

Reviews.Title: This phone is a piece of garbage.
Reviews.Author: Robin Coxe
Reviews.Content: I have never written a review of an electronic device on Amazon before, but I felt impelled to do so for this product as a Public Service Announcement.  I've been a BlackBerry user for years, as I'm partial to opposable thumb typing on an actual keyboard.  Sadly, I stopped using this phone after 2 days and reverted back to my tried and true BlackBerry Bold.  The Curve 3G 9300 is noticeably lighter and smaller than the Bold and the battery life is a bit better, but the advantages stop there. The device looks and feels cheaply made.  The screen cracked the first day I got the phone-- I have no idea how.  I didn't drop it or bash it into a brick wall, although I was tempted.  Half the screen turned purple after whatever nanoscopic impact caused the crack.  But the Achilles Heel of this phone is the optical trackpad.  It's either completely non-responsive or spastic, which makes scrolling through e-mail, what should be an idle, painless activity, a major hassle.  I tried adjusting the vertical and horizontal trackpad sensitivities to no avail.  The other frustrating "feature" worth mentioning is that the screen is smaller than the Bold, so that when the phone is locked, the lock message obscures the little orange icon displaying the number of new e-mails in the top center of the screen.

Reviews.Title: Blackberry 9300 Curve 3G Order from Worldwide Distributors
Reviews.Author: Mila Balquin
Reviews.Content: Item ordered was well-packed and it arrived on time. I am very happy with my Blackberry Curve 9300.  I love it.  I did not encounter any problems whatsoever.  Contacting the site (Worldwide Distributors) was fairly easy. I did not have to talk to a machine. I just wish all sites are just like Worldwide Distributors.  I have started recommending it to my friends, especially those who are tied up with 2-year contracts with their service providers and find that those data plans are not exactly what they need.On a scale of 1-10, I will give Worldwide Distributors an easy 10!!!!

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: Rico
Reviews.Content: this phone has been great to me, its ability to handle multiple task is amazing especially for the price! 2 thumbs up!

Reviews.Title: The phone you buy might not be real.
Reviews.Author: Dillon
Reviews.Content: First and foremost, people please be aware of what you are buying. I bought my first one and it was a counterfeit phone from China, so was the second. Both of them were described as brand new. This is how you recognize a fake phone. I hope it'll help in somehow.1. All of the labels out side of the box are miss-printed, words and numbers are not clear. The REAL ONE comes with a very clear and well-printed.2. For those of you that had used BB before, you can tell the fake phone fell very cheap and light. The REAL ONE will felt very solid in hand as well as it is pretty heavy.3. In side the fake phone, labels in side the back(behind the battery) are also miss-printed some words, and also not clear. In the REAL one, all of the words are well-printed and that the MUST.4. Turn on the phone and try move the little touch pad in the middle of the phone. If you have a fake phone, it is very hard to move the cursor up and down, (sometimes left and right but mostly up and down). In the REAL ONE, you can easily move it any where you want and it almost no delay at all.Lastly, sorry for my bad English if I make any mistake. I had seen so many people blamed BB for bad products but the real problem is we are not using the real BB, we are using some bull @#% from China.I rate this phone 4 stars because I had used it before and still using it. I want to buy an extra one for my mom but it seem we have too much problems of buying real products from Amazon nowadays.Feel free to ask me if you have any concern.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed!!!! It is refurbished and screen has lots of dust. Screen Frame got broken in a break
Reviews.Author: Raja Sachithanantham
Reviews.Content: It is a refurbished modelTmobile 3G/4G not working.Trackball was half damagedDisplay screen had dustScreen frame got broken in a weekTotally Disappointed in buying such a low quality product

Reviews.Title: Product Damaged
Reviews.Author: AirTrans
Reviews.Content: We buy this cell and it was supposed to be a new one.  But we receive it and it is re-manufactured / refurbished. We buy it for an executive of our company and it doesn't work well. We need urgently a solution. It is not possible to be cheated like this.  we are trying to contact the seller. PLEASE HELP US!!!

Reviews.Title: I feel cheated
Reviews.Author: Rafael Arturo Aldana
Reviews.Content: I really feel cheated with this product! I supposed to buy a new phone but did not! is REFURBISHED! Phone out is very good! actually that looks back to 100%, display, keyboard and trackpad are new but inside is USED, please if you offer a new product, do it for real! the phone apparently was new but has more than 35 hours of use!

Reviews.Title: NICE PHONE & KEYBOARD FAIL, NOT A NICE COMBINATION
Reviews.Author: Gustavo Soriano Torres "Colombian"
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone with international warranty and in arrived on time and working perfectly, but 3 days later the keyboard letters a,q,e,r,u and o, wont work, im not living in america so i found tedious to ship back the product and waiting about 3 weeks to get a replacement using my warranty, so i went to a technician, the problem was a keyboard controller chip, so he had to changed it, i barely used it and it got damaged. it cost me 60 bucks to fixed it, but i would pay that than to wait about 3 weeks for something should be working perfectly at least 1 year.

Reviews.Title: Unbelievable
Reviews.Author: DC
Reviews.Content: I ordered this phone at $150.00 yesterday, and today I receive a message that my order was cancelled. Well, I checked the site and found the same phone listed, but for about $40.00 more. I have never had anything like this happen to me before, and I have been ordering from Amazon and it's affiliates for a long time. I can't believe this!!

Reviews.Title: incomplete description and missing items
Reviews.Author: baca_ar
Reviews.Content: 3G does not work for all international locations. Be careful! It only supports 1,4,8 3G bands. This needs to be better specified on the product description. Also there are some missing items: no headsets, no sd memory and charger plugs broke in 1 day.Phone overall is ok, but I cannot use the 3G network and need to buy the missing/defectuous accessories.

Reviews.Title: Excellent!
Reviews.Author: Jonathan
Reviews.Content: This cellphone is excellent it has everything that i want... is incredible, im really happy with this purchase. I dont regret about this.. i recommend this to all the people that want this product.

Reviews.Title: Thats not what it is supposse I bought
Reviews.Author: Peque
Reviews.Content: The phone does not look new. The box was open and it is not the blacberry box. There is not manual inside, no UPS cable for the charger. Only four connections for diferents electricities. There is not any international warranty document. So the operation was very bad, this seller is very very very bad. I have to review the phone operation so I expect not to have more surprises.OEM very bad company.

Reviews.Title: Be careful with the seller
Reviews.Author: Mary Kate
Reviews.Content: I ordered 2 graphite grey and I received 1 silver and 1 graphite grey. One of them looked used with dust and when I placed my chip in it, the system was already started (not brand new).I am still trying it, but I wouldnt be surprised if anything doesnt work as they do not look new.

Reviews.Title: Excelent
Reviews.Author: Tom
Reviews.Content: Exelent product, very quick delivery, The ítem was as new as you buy it in any retail, thats the difference with púber delivery companies

Reviews.Title: Trackpad Problem
Reviews.Author: Moises!
Reviews.Content: This cell phone has a faulty track pad. The problem is that the cursor keep moving to the right. It is not only me having this trouble, try to google it and you will see.I tried everything, reboot, change sensitivity... everything, im going to replace this cellphone with 9700.

Reviews.Title: Everything Ok
Reviews.Author: David Muñoz "David"
Reviews.Content: Shipped on time, delivered on time and it's just what I've bought.I've got my phone on Venezuela, it arrived on perfect conditions and works fine with my service provider.Thank you very much.

Reviews.Title: Cancelled Item
Reviews.Author: Esteban del Campo
Reviews.Content: Excelente vendedor, el producto lo conozco y es muy bueno, pero el vendedor es muy atento y lamentablemente, tuve que cancelar el tramite, pero sin dudas que es recomendable por la forma honesta de comportarse.Great Seller, I knew the product and it's great, but the seller was very kind, Paifully, I had to cancell the shipping, anyways the seller is highly recommended because of the honest way of managing the sell.

Reviews.Title: It's a great phone!!
Reviews.Author: jasrod
Reviews.Content: The phone arrived on time, it works well so far, it works with 3g perfectly in every company here in Venezuela (Digitel, Movistar $ Movilnet), software is updated, no scratches, no malfunctions it's ok, it's a brand new phone and its box came with a protection seal (those that every company put in their products to certify that it hasn't been used before) & I liked that. The only negative thing is that the earphones were not included in the box, they must! since they're part of the main accessories of every phone. But in general, I recomend this product & seller.

Reviews.Title: Good product . Buen producto
Reviews.Author: Eduardon
Reviews.Content: The product arrived on time in good condition. I simply connected the chip and ran the wireless network in my country (Ecuador), copied the backup of my previous team and all my contacts were added, including the Blackberry Messenger. The only thing I like is the short time the battery lasts around 13 hours without saying much, but it'll fix this by acquiring an additional battery. I recommend buying this telephone.El producto llegó en el tiempo previsto, en buenas condiciones. Simplemente conecté el chip y funcionó con la red celular de mi país (Ecuador), copié el respaldo de mi anterior equipo y todos mis contactos fueron agregados, inclusive los del Blackberry Messenger. Lo único que no me agrada es el poco tiempo que dura la batería, alrededor de 13 horas sin hablar mucho, pero esto lo solucionaré adquiriendo una batería adicional. Recomiendo comprar este telefóno.

Reviews.Title: reclame
Reviews.Author: Luis Rotundo
Reviews.Content: Good days, my dissatisfaction wanted to make come to you with the product that was bought to his shop. The motive obeys to that the telephone blackberry bold 9900. They it sent brand T-MOBILE and never in his advertising they specify a brand. This equipment does not sail in Internet, since it is not compatible in venezuela with the majorities of cellular companies. It is a deceitful advertising that you must eliminate since they defraud the buyers with products that they do not specify in his advertising or photos.

Reviews.Title: Unlocked
Reviews.Author: Pia De Lorenzis
Reviews.Content: I received an item that is not UNLOCKED as you sold  and it doesn't work with my card.It has a paper with a code that I tried to use to unlocked but it didn't work. it's an AT&T; phone and also it has a tag inside from ORACLE .... If this item is Oracle property you can not sell it ...

Reviews.Title: They are not serious business people
Reviews.Author: DonyPeta
Reviews.Content: People in the store are not serious people cellounge: Buy a BB 9300 and came to Venezuela with the old fixtures and damaged part that the phone did not come with the 148 band but I came up with 256 bands which I served to when using 3G, the phone finally had signs of being already used for the U key was damaged. Cellounge The truth is not recommended for anything, it is recommend but not 1000% because I did go through a bad deal and I cheated a damaged cell. So my friends online purchase will not fall into the trap of Cellounge store.

Reviews.Title: Blackberry

Reviews.Content: This product did not look new. The box had definitely been opened, and it did not come with a memory card like a new blackberry would! That cost me 50$ by itself!! Not really happy with the provider!

Reviews.Content: I write from Venezuela the product arrived in perfect condition and in the day specified for delivery and I can sertificar that works with the telephone lines Movilnet and Movistar.Spanish: EspañolEscribo desde Venezuela el producto llegó en perfecto estado y en el día estipulado para su entrega y yo puedo sertificar que el trabaja con las lineas telefonicas Movilnet y Movistar.

Reviews.Title: I recomended this seller

Reviews.Content: I like the product.It has neither shortcomings nor electronic damages.The operator of my preference located me.It is quite rapid on having gained access to the applications of the same one.The connection to Internet is rapid and stable.

Reviews.Title: Refurbished

Reviews.Content: i was worried that it would breakdown and i was not going to be able to get it fixed since i live in turkey but no i used it and i used it hard but it still works perfeclty.

Reviews.Title: EXCELENTE

Reviews.Content: Todo muy bien. Me gusto... Fue lo que pedi... llego a tiempo... Excelente, recomendando 100%...Saludos desde Valencia - Venezuela...

Reviews.Title: bien

Reviews.Content: I am be very grateful for the product, as, since it is for what it was expecting from this service, thank you very much and luck.

Reviews.Content: rapida entrega y excelente producto! lo recomiendo a toda la comunidad! excelente calidad y atencion por parte del los vendedores, muchas gracias!

Reviews.Content: I really like this blackberry because the phone is simple and everything works smoothly....I recommend this phone to anyone who want simple phone.

Reviews.Title: Blackberry Curve 3G 9300 Unlocked GSM SmartPhone with 2 MP Camera, Wi-Fi,..

Reviews.Content: i prefer Blackberry's button keyboards than touch screen keyboards. This phone works as expected. The only complaint i have is the battery that comes with the phone is a cheap battery and does not hold a charge for very long.

Reviews.Content: The phone is good, but somehow it was not what I wanted. Cosmos Wireless worked with me without getting angry, obnoxious or demanding. I did end up buying another phone from them. It's not the product, it's me. I guess I am so much into my old phone, no other one can compare!

Reviews.Title: Gift

Reviews.Content: Bought this for me and got my wife an iPhone. Blackberry was up & running immediately.Works great. Easy to use & totally business.  (iphone took 2 hours to set-up & I had to download a 83 page manual, create an account, give a credit card number just to down load my wife's f Facebook.Any business person should stick with blackberry, all the other phones are toys.

After waiting for this phone to be shipped and opened it only to see it is bricked, and can never be used as a phone. What a cheat. Please avoid, especially if you are shipping it international and that too as a gift. I will stay away from this seller. Buy at your own risk

Reviews.Content: Battery lasted 3 months and started swelling and warping. They are not original Blackberry OEM batteries although the label states they are...., so you will need to buy a proper one. Remember that when pricing this phone.

Reviews.Content: i am unsatisfied with my purchase. i did not get two of the same phones firstly, the at&t; i received is unable to connect to bbm chat, wireless network and blue tooth. the other phone works excellent. i am uncertain what can be done to rectify this problem. can u please be of assistance. thank you

Now, I use iPhone 4S and galaxy III, and I bought one curve of bb for the road and guess what? It works as never never did before. When some kind of smartphone comes popular, they go slower and slower to the must. Then: ow an old model like this.

Reviews.Content: A replacement for my son....he loves this phone.  Texting so much easier for a 6-2 man.!  His words , he thinks it is the best for his needs..

Reviews.Content: the phone is great except that i did not get a headset. will i be able to get 1 on my next purchase of another phone?

Reviews.Title: Scrolling Button Problem
Reviews.Author: Sam Tucker
Reviews.Content: I like the basic idea of the Blackberry Curve but the scrolling button works less and less. I would not purchase this phone. Go with a touch screen.

Reviews.Content: The track pad is very slow. At first the track pad did not work I had to switch the phone off about 4 times and remove the battery before it started to work.

Reviews.Title: disappointed
Reviews.Author: Jude
Reviews.Content: I am very disapointed with this product. I bought 2 of these phones they only came with a charger, no earpiece, no USB cable and no memory card. This definately does not meet my expectation, i am a long time customer of amazon and i expected better service from agencies doing business on amazon.

Reviews.Title: my opinion of the product

Reviews.Content: Meets my expectations, I recommend it completely, it is very nice and good weight and size, plus is quite repido during use.

Reviews.Title: Blackberry curve 93000
Reviews.Author: Flor Sanchez
Reviews.Content: Good afternoon my name is Flor Sanchez and I have purchased several products through its prestigious company, all of excellent quality. I strongly motivated to write to a friend who also purchases made through you, the matter is next in date frebrero 03, 2012 ahquirí a cell phone blackberry released, annex the guide, "03/02/12, 002 - 9542781-9174616, "9300EUBK BlackBerry Curve 3G 9300 Unlocked GSM Smartphone with 2 MP Camera, GPS, and Bluetooth - No Warranty (Graphite Grey)", Wireless Phone Accessory, B003TZGYKI, new, Zena Mobile LLC, $ 196.00,1,9724 ,, lilyco28@gmail.com, 03/06/12, LORENA PRIETO, 5367 W 23RD CT, HIALEAH, Florida,33016-7021, Shipped, LaserShip (LS12566869), $ 196.00, "which got my sister in miami, but I sent him to Venezuela with my mother when she went on vacation in September of the same year, since I got piude not make it connect to the blackberry platform, so I resigned and I had only to receive calls and send sMS Messages, and when in wifi could surf the internet, my friend insisted me to learn from my situation in which contact them and request them guidance on what to do, it is hypothesized that perhaps the PhoneSet is blocked from the united states at the level of sfotwear platform or, if so as I can do to desbloqueralo and use it as it should be in my country?.........because it works in terms PhoneSet calls, coverage and other excellent properties in language telephone companies of Venezuela they say no blackberry up the company with which I have connected my service is Movistar. I appreciate your attention and prompt response and probable solution, ohn little something more could acquire a copy of the purchase invoice not get my original, thank you, my email lilyco28@gmail.com. Thanks Flor Sanchez

Reviews.Title: was not unlocked
Reviews.Author: Carlos H. Molina Rojas
Reviews.Content: The cell phone was not unlocked, need to make an additional payment to a technician to unlock it without taking into account that the equipment is in very good condition

Reviews.Title: Blackberry
Reviews.Author: Harold D Gomez
Reviews.Content: Its OK. Its a phone. Cant believe it with all the bells and whistles it doesn't have an FM radio.

Reviews.Title: Blackberry Curve 3G 9300 Unlocked Phone
Reviews.Author: NANA K ABABIO
Reviews.Content: This phone is not used yet, because it is going to be used in Ghana.  Anyway I like it very well.

Reviews.Title: beat expectation
Reviews.Author: Ian Ayton
Reviews.Content: arrive before estimated and look brand new. Great service as expected. Will use again if required and tell others what to expect.

Reviews.Title: the phone came damaged
Reviews.Author: Rosa Altamirano
Reviews.Content: the phone came damaged always turn off .. i need to change it ..  can i do it something ? the problem was since first week of us

Reviews.Title: Not suitable
Reviews.Author: Hermione
Reviews.Content: I used this mobile for almost a year and unfortunately I happen not to like this product at all. It did not suit my needs. As a matter of fact, I've just changed my mobile! It would get stuck several times while surfing the web and running several programs. It might have just happened to me, but I felt disappointed indeed, since it has been promoted as perfectly able to run lots of apps at the same time, and that did not happen to me.I would not recommend it.

Reviews.Title: This is a fake BB smart phone.Do not buy it.
Reviews.Author: amazonfan
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone thinking it was a really BB smart phone.After i recevied it I tested  it out and the phone. I learned that the phone was fake.I use black at my work place. if I didn't use BB phone at my work place I would have been taken.LMAO.I have returned the fake phone to the seller and I am still waiting for my refund.The seller  is telling me they don't know where the phone at and playing games hopening that I give up and go away so they could keep the phone and my money too.The seller has no respect for their customers.I hope you learned something from me and stay away from wrong sellers here at amazon.com.I have bought  many things in the past  online  here at amazon.com and many sites and I never had  any problems getting my refund.I think this seller should be banned from selling anything on Amazon.com and online.Do not waste your money and time with this seller.The seller sells fake phones that look like  real phones.This seller sold fake B.B phone to me.

I tried to fix it and they said it was a product reassembly, or reset, or if it seems best new product was not a factory. Reviews.Title: The Perfect Device for Making Yourself Miserable
Reviews.Author: A Boy Named Sue
Reviews.Content: T only acquired this phone because I dropped my previous (a Motorola RAZR MAXX) in the pool and needed a quick backup. A friend sold me his old one for 25 bucks. Now I know why. The screen and buttons are too small and it drives me crazy. I miss the large intuitive touch screen and controls. However, the reception and sound quality aren't terrible, so I'll give it three stars instead of one.

Reviews.Title: Works with AT&T;
Reviews.Author: Jon "Jon"
Reviews.Content: I bought this device as a "bridge" as I lost my iPhone 4 and did not want to upgrade to the 4S due to the imminent release of the 5.  I am delighted that it worked with AT&T; 3G bands.I must say that I missed the keypad and it's been a wonder and huge relief to have physical feel on the typing, certain very assuring feel.  Also Blackberry 6 is definitely a nice update (device not supported by Blackberry 7) and a huge difference from my old Curve back in Feb  2009 when I last had it.  The menus and executions are fast and the aesthetics of the OS are polished--pleasing if that is what others would say although I didn't load it up with tons of apps as it is only a temporary device.  It has Vlingo - Siri's BB counterpart, not as intelligent as Siri but does the job.  I don't do socials very much so I didn't care about FB, Tweeter and social feeds although its got a unified social feed status.The track pad is very responsive, unless your finger is wet or oily, then you need more skin traction.The Blackberry Desktop for Mac is one that i love very much.  My Mac address book (not icloud, local address book), and calendar entries synced without a glitch.Keypad is still here to stay I guess.Just some thoughts about setting up BIS and for those with $30 Data Unlimited iPhone Plan:I initially had problem setting up the BIS because the device is not recognized by the network as this unit from Amazon is unlocked.  I called AT&T; and reported the IMEI and PIN of the device, rebooted and everything went well, including setting up my AOL email account on the BIS from the phone (does not allow you to setup BIS through your Mac or PC browser--very strange).  My $30 Data Unlimited iPhone plan which I had since Feb 2009 was converted to same $30 Data Unlimited Blackberry plan.  AT&T; rep assured me that I can switch back to same Data Unlimited iPhone plan when it is released.

Reviews.Title: Broken Track pad !!!!
Reviews.Author: Ivan E. Narvaez Arciniegas
Reviews.Content: I received the cell phone but it is not working fine ... the track pad is damage.  Unfortunately the phone is out of US and is not cheap and easy to return it.

Reviews.Title: Cheap quality plastic - battery is made of card paper
Reviews.Author: Prashant Rajaram Rasal
Reviews.Content: I have been using a blackberry curve 3G 9300, and liked its robust and professional look. I felt it would be a perfect gift for my father. I ordered it and was horrified with the quality of the cell when I received it. The front keypad looked cheap, and the back cover was of very bad quality... It felt like it will break if i pull it to hard. And I was right - when i tried to remove the battery to place a memory card - the batter just came apart. And it was not surprising as this piece was Made in Mexico - and i though only CHina made cheap stuff. Not worth the price - looks are of cheap quality plastic... and the back will break if you remove it more than 3 times. I felt like returning it - but with my father's birthday next day and having promised a cell... I just gave it to him and asked him never to open the back - as it would be the last time. Paid $180 and got a piece not worth more than 50.

Reviews.Content: LAST MONTH I BOUGHT:Blackberry Curve 3G 9300 Unlocked GSM SmartPhone with 2 MP Camera, Wi-Fi, GPS, Bluetooth - Unlocked Phone - International Version - Graphite GreySold by: Jiaming PanTHIS BLACKBERRY HAS A PROBLEM. WHEN YOU WRITE A MESSAGE, EVERY LETTER YOU PUSH, THE CELL PHONE WRITES 3 OR 4 TIMES THE LETTER.HOW CAN I DO TO FIX IT? Reviews.Title: Rather Disappointing
Reviews.Author: Claire L.
Reviews.Content: It has been my experience that when I see things on amazon with sub-par reviews, but the product still looks really cool, that when I purchase it, it ends up being a great product. Well, that certainly wasn't the case with this phone. It is light as air and hardly has any mass to it at all- making it feel like a toy- not to mention there are serious issues with the track pad. It constantly wants to scroll down, and it does that even when I'm scrolling manually. It jumps all over the place. It didn't even come with a proper user manual. It's clearly a Blackberry CURVE, yet they sent me an opened box with a BB Torch user manual in it- which isn't very helpful, and I was really really perplexed by this. I've never had such a bad experience with a seller on amazon in my life. I understand it's an unlocked phone, however, for the price that I paid I certainly expected something better than this toy I've got now. Not to mention all of the software needed to be updated. I guess this is an old model because the software that was loaded on the phone when I got it was from 2006. I wouldn't personally recommend buying this phone simply because of the issues with the trackpad and the general sketchiness of the whole situation what with the BB Torch user manual being enclosed and everything.

Blackberry Curve 3G 9300 Unlocked GSM SmartPhone with 2 MP Camera, Wi-Fi, GPS, Bluetooth - Unlocked Phone - International Version - Graphite Grey; Amazon.com order number: 103-7059328-4789047. It is a scam which Amazon do this must take responsibility for what I paid in lost tax nationalization, what I paid for shipping and what I paid for the crap they sent me but I will undertake to make public ridicule and rip they do with the people's money

I sent it to 2 different BB repair stores, and said to me that the phone has no possibility of repair because the motherboard was previously fixed, and was too damaged. So the item sold was REFUBRISHED and not a new one!!! Very dissapoined. Now I am asking for a refund, because this is not what I bought!

Reviews.Content: desde aqui de venezuela, se le agradece la labor prestada, todo llego en muy buen estado y a la fecha indicada..

Reviews.Title: THE CELLPHONE ITS BLOCKED
Reviews.Author: Alejandro
Reviews.Content: I BOUGHT A CELLPHONE, ITS A BLACKBERRY 9300, I RECIVED AND IT WORKED PERFECTLY WELL FOR 2 DAYS, THEN I FOUND OUT THAT THE EMAIL ADDRESS CONFIGURATION DESAPPEARED, AFTER THAT EVERYTHING STOP WORKING, I DONT KNOW WHAT TO DO, I DONT HAVE ANY INTERNET CONECTION. A TECHNICAL IN BLACBERRY TOLD ME, THAT COULD BE, THAT THEY HAVE THE BLACKBERRY INTERNET SERVICE IS BLOCKED, AND THAT THE BEST I CAN DO IS TO RETURN THE PRODUCT WHILE THE PHONE IS ON WARRANTY. IF THERE IS ANY POSIBILITY THAT I COULD GET A PHONE NUMBER WERE TO CALL YOU I WOULD BE VERY GRATEFULWAITING FOR YOUR PROMPT RESPONSE ATTEALEJANDRO ARIAS

Reviews.Title: refurbished cellphone
Reviews.Author: Ana Barriga
Reviews.Content: Cellphone arrived with a line on the screen, the box was not the original, they should not be selling refurbished items as new ones. I did not return this item since I paid shipping and taxes to send it overseas.

Reviews.Title: did i buy a lemon ??
Reviews.Author: ron mark
Reviews.Content: While the phone appears to be 'new' since my purchase in January 2012 i have had to replace the track pad , and continue to struggle with the problem of NO MEMORY . I only use Google maps ( since deleted) Whatsapp and local newspaper and Facebook . The phone is constantly processing . unfortunately i took the phone out of state or else i would have certainly returned it to sender. i am totally unhappy

Reviews.Title: BB curve 3G - Phone Not complete-Wrong Band statement (for Venezuela)
Reviews.Author: sebabs32
Reviews.Content: I have had this phone for about a month now. The product description says 850/900/1800/1900MHz frequencies and 3G HSDPA 850/900/1700/1900/2100 plus GPRS/EDGE, meaning, in venezuela, should support Movistar/Movilnet and even Digitel Bands. However, this is not true, this phone only supports 1,4,8 3G bands (2100,1700,900).This needs to be better specified on the product description.Also there are some missing items: No headsets, No SD memoryPhone overall is ok, but I had to change to DIGITEL to be able to use the 3G network, also had to buy to buy the missing accessories.

Reviews.Title: mal functioning
Reviews.Author: Elvira
Reviews.Content: My Blackberry never worked properly. It re-starts alone, without previous warning or anyone touching it.. Very often the screen makes a continuous scroll upwards.. (without touching the pad nor the keyboard!!) So if you try to write a message at the the time it is impossible because it is as if someone is scrolling upwards with the pad..! It's quite difficult to explain, it must be seen..If I am in the outside, for example in the sun, it gets worse. There is no way for me to use it at that moment because the texts moves upwards like crazy..Sometimes it works properly, and when it does, I am satisfied with the product. The problem is that I don't know what to do to solve the malfunctioning. I live in Argentina, I don't know if the warranty is international..

Reviews.Title: Incomplete!
Reviews.Author: Patricia
Reviews.Content: I received the bb in an opened box!, didnt come with the sd card (memory) and the headseat is damaged!...Im really disappointed cause im from ecuador, it would take a lot of time to complain and to have what i have missing from my order.I hope the cell works properly

Reviews.Title: They are refurbished
Reviews.Author: Agustin
Reviews.Content: We bought two phones to a company that at first seemed to be serious and had many sales. Phones when they arrived did not come in their original boxes .. the boots are not the originals and worse are not refurbished. The team is well, but the silver casing have broken several times in the two phones, mine and my sister. The original batteries are also not the first time they arrived, a battery not walk and had to send 2 of gift by express delivery. In my cell, he took off the plastic of the screen, revealing that he was badly stuck and very old glue. Now I have a problem with the speaker does not sound and I have to pull back and it rings.Council, be very careful when buying and find out well before!

Reviews.Title: BLACK 9300
Reviews.Author: EDUARDO ALFONZO
Reviews.Content: producto Excelente tema totalmente nuevo llego en perfecto estado y en el tiempo acordado, proveedor serio muy atento para resolver cualquier inconveniente con el equipo gracias a dios todo bien

Reviews.Title: happy berry
Reviews.Author: Mitra Ramjit
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for a friend of mine and she has had no complaints and the phone worked fine straight out of the box.

Reviews.Title: very good
Reviews.Author: wilmer
Reviews.Content: excellent product arrived very fast, pretty good, is what appears in the description of the package, and is in perfect condition thanks for your attention.

Reviews.Title: Good stuff
Reviews.Author: Lucia
Reviews.Content: I love my phone, the camera takes wonderfull photos. the battery whent dead after three months but I guess it's a BB's problem and not from the seller

Reviews.Title: Good CEl
Reviews.Author: Eduardo Jose Ramirez Flores "T.S.U. Analista ...
Reviews.Content: trajo un defecto... el trackpack se le daño a los 3 dias de comprado. y uno de los bordes del telefono esta rayado.

Reviews.Title: Blackberry Curve
Reviews.Author: Donna B
Reviews.Content: Prompt service.. Phone was exactly as advertised. Very happy with the Blackberry Curve, My man dropped his in water, needed a replacement phone. This is exactly what he wanted.

Reviews.Title: Excelente
Reviews.Author: luzmarina
Reviews.Content: Excelente producto, recomendado 100%, buena atencion por parte del vendedor, sin incovenientes, ni contratiempos, funcional al 100%, el equipo no ha tenido ningun probelma...

Reviews.Title: not good
Reviews.Author: hernan schumacher
Reviews.Content: the cell phone is not in good condition. battery not charging well and for this reason constantly goes without notice that battery is low. is there any guarantee for this damage 'because we have spent a lot of money and thought it was one of the best phones.

Reviews.Title: Phone Refurbished, doesnt work!
Reviews.Author: jesus
Reviews.Content: The phone is refurbished is not new, it only works for a month and do not turn on again. I will not buy technology in Amazon. Also the phone came locked, I had to pay to unlock it.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone. Works pretty fast 3G with Movilnet Venezuela. Excelente celular para el precio. Funciona en 3G Movilnet
Reviews.Author: Jesalcedoc
Reviews.Content: I just inserted the Movilnet Sim card from my old BB 8320 Gsm and Ready for 3G!! It came in the box with everything brand new. AC converter, USB cable, Headphones. I would recomend this phone for the price. Works in 3g with bands 1, 2 (Which is for Movistar-Movilnet) 5 and 6. Does not work for band 8 which is for DigitelFunciona 3G bien en Movilnet Venezuela. Viene completo con sus accesorios en su caja original si usan una empresa seria para traerlo a Venezuela. Recomiendo actualizar el OS a la ultima version 2547 usando Desktop Manager. No funciona en la banda 8 de Digitel. El pedido lo hice por Amazon pero el producto lo suministró ZENA Mobile

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: jayz
Reviews.Content: Since I travel a lot I normally change operators in each country where I am at. No problem so far, phone has worked great.Arrived on time. Great seller.

Reviews.Title: Great phone!
Reviews.Author: JDR
Reviews.Content: this blackberry cellphone is OK it works very good over 3G and the SO is even betterIn Venezuela you can use it with any operator(y)

Reviews.Title: confirmación del producto
Reviews.Author: yolauribel
Reviews.Content: Buenos díasEl producto llego en excelentes condiciones y el proceso de compra fue rapido y muy efectivo. muy buena compra les recomiendo este proveedor para sus futuras compras

Reviews.Title: A Happy customer
Reviews.Author: Kenneth Brooks
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone as a replacement to my son's phone. He has a love for blackberry phone and all my attempts to switch him to androids or other phone os's have failed. He is now happy again and for me, that's enough.  The phone itself is a great tool as I use one for business. I have basically the same model.

Reviews.Title: Works as advertised
Reviews.Author: nBee1
Reviews.Content: The phone is unlocked and will work out the box. For internet services you need to contact your local provider but once you get that sorted out there's no problem.

Reviews.Title: Good experience
Reviews.Author: Sandra
Reviews.Content: I received the BB in the expected time and it has worked very well. I have not had any problem with it until now.

Reviews.Title: GREAT!
Reviews.Author: DEastmanB
Reviews.Content: Just as it was described.. Perfect! In time, no problem at all... I recommend this product to everyone! Simply great

Reviews.Title: Curbe 3G
Reviews.Author: Andre Altschul
Reviews.Content: Everything arrived in perfect conditions and on time. The device is working well and connected to Vivo, that is my wireless provider in Brazil.

Reviews.Title: blckberry3
Reviews.Author: Edwin
Reviews.Content: la compra se realizo por amazon el precio junto nuevo con loa accesorios que vienen  con el producto en su caja bien embalada y cuidada gracias

Reviews.Title: Good phone, despite the battery
Reviews.Author: Amanda
Reviews.Content: The phone works perfectly. The only thing that could be betteris the life of the battery, that does not last long if you usethe internet services very often.

Reviews.Title: Perfecto-excelente!
Reviews.Author: Nora Chinea "ReinaMorena58"
Reviews.Content: Blackberry Curve 3G 9300 Unlocked GSM SmartPhone with 2 MP Camera, Wi-Fi, GPS, Bluetooth - Unlocked Phone - International Version - Graphite GreyHi everyone, the phone arrived in its original box with all the original accesories as well (Headphones, AC cable/Adapter/CD) and it is working perfectly. I bought it to Worldwide Distributors, 5 starts for them too as sellers. My only disappointment was that the one I received came with Wind (Canadian cell carrier) logo... but I can live with that.Regarding the 3G, if it does not work in Venezuela (I am venezuelan-living in Caracas) or any other country will be because your local carrier's platform not because the phone is a fraud or so, far from that.In Venezuela for you to have full 3G you should sign contract with Movistar which nowadays is the most advanced platform with 3.5, then Digitel with 3.2 and at the bottom Movilnet which is 2.5... so, if your local carrier is Movilnet you WILL NOT have 3G but 2G still..... so article advertising is correct, I did received what I bought!Bottom line, I am satisfied with the purchase I made and with the seller, again, it was Worldwide Distributors!Saludos y gracias!

Reviews.Title: I have two weecks with
Reviews.Author: Pamelorais
Reviews.Content: I recive the product before that they say in the beginning, is a good product. Works perfect for me. My sim card from Europa do not have any problem. The phone do not have flash in the camara, but if you take the pic in the day or with a external ligth is perfect. My bb comes black with a blue border if you want other color you should ask, i don't care about that.

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: NIherts
Reviews.Content: The product arrived in perfect condition without any problem, the package is the right size to what you buy, works perfect, I have no problem with the telephony functions as expected

Reviews.Title: PERFECT
Reviews.Author: WILY E
Reviews.Content: works like a charm, at first I was scared, because you never save, but I get perfect and everything in the box again, I have no complaints

Reviews.Title: EXCELENTE
Reviews.Author: Amavis Osorno
Reviews.Content: Buenisimooooo...... se los recomiendo a todos los compradores, super puntual y el producto es excelente, tal cual como se describe en la pagina es como te llegara a tu casa,!! FUNCIONA PERFECTAMENTE

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: garl3000@yahoo.es
Reviews.Content: Producto excelente y buen estado entregado a tiempo y en condiciones óptimas altamente recomendado el vendedor y con buena credibilidad

Reviews.Title: Beware international buyers
Reviews.Author: Alejandro
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone to upgrade my old Blackberry 8520. Once connected to the carrier (outside the US) I discovered 3G doesn't work. After some research I found T-Mobile phones have a different 3G frequency.In sum, the upgrade was not so, and now I have to sell this one (with the cosequent loss), and look for the same model but AT&T; enabled.Not to mention the complications of bringing the equipment to my country.Otherwise is nice.Good luck!

Reviews.Title: Outdated phone
Reviews.Author: JWink
Reviews.Content: A phone that has fallen behind the times in comparision to Android and Iphone.  A difficult to use, difficult to type phone that drops calls frequently.  The track ball works when it wants and with its small screen who would want to type on anyways.

Reviews.Title: Not very pleased
Reviews.Author: Roosevelt
Reviews.Content: the phone came without its original USB cable, without headphones, the manual and it said apparently lost again as you may hurt I'm in Venezuela but not recommended at all.

Reviews.Title: NO RECOMIENDO AL PROVEEDOR "The OEM Shop"
Reviews.Author: SABRINA
Reviews.Content: La publicacion de la venta indicaba un telefono nuevo y llego en una caja llena de polvo, el telefono un poco sucio, sin cable USB y sin audifonos, lo cual me parece una falta de respecto ya que indica que viene con todos sus accesorios. Ni siquiera la caja indica que es BLACKBERRY y sin la etiqueta de verificacion de seriales...solo falta que no levante 3G y seria la peor compra realizada a este proveedor. Blackberry Curve 3G 9300 Unlocked GSM SmartPhone with 2 MP Camera, Wi-Fi, GPS, Bluetooth - Unlocked Phone - International Warranty - Graphite Grey

Reviews.Title: Unable to turn to spanish
Reviews.Author: Gaby
Reviews.Content: So I bought this "unlocked" phone to give to my mom who speaks spanish. We have had multiple technitians look at the phone and we have been unable to set the phone's language to spanish. It ended up in a drawer... what phones don't have multiple languages these days???? really????

Reviews.Title: unhappy
Reviews.Author: Franyennis Fernandez
Reviews.Content: Buy two phones and only received one three months ago and never sent the other, did not fulfill the agreement

Reviews.Title: URGENTLY NEED INVOICE
Reviews.Author: maria moya
Reviews.Content: good morning. I need very urgently the invoice. thanksI hope your answer. and are very good these 2 products.I recommend it

Reviews.Title: tiene problemas
Reviews.Author: irvin
Reviews.Content: el celular tiene algunos problemas, las teclas aveces no escriben y el boton de bajar el volumen no funciona esperaba algo mejor

Reviews.Title: reclamo
Reviews.Author: suje
Reviews.Content: I need to know where my order. Never came. Need Help. Should I DO?necesito saber donde esta mi pedido. nunca llego. necesito ayuda. que debo hacer?Blackberry Curve 3G 9300 Unlocked GSM SmartPhone with 2 MP Camera, Wi-Fi, GPS, Bluetooth - Unlocked Phone - International Version - Graphite Grey

Reviews.Title: DOES NOT WORK
Reviews.Author: Pedro Tortosa
Reviews.Content: I BOUGHT THIS BLACKBERRY ON APRIL 9 AND IS NOT TOTALLY UNLOCKED. YOU CAN'T CONNECT WITH THE BLACKBERRY NETWORK, SO IT ONLY WORK AS A NORMAL PHONE, NOT AS A BLACKBERRY OR A SMART PHONE. I DON'T LEAVE IN THE USA SO IF VERY HARD FOR ME TO RETURN IT. I ALSO SPEND ON INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING. WASTE OF MONEY AND NO PHONE. I LIVE IN VENEZUELA AND NOW I HAVE TO BUY ANOTHER ONE. DO YOU TAKE RESPONSIBILITY ON THIS?

Reviews.Title: excelente producto
Reviews.Author: eleazar montilla venezuela
Reviews.Content: excelente producto esto va para mis amigo los venezolanos que siempre hay dudas de los paquetes personas serias y todo es como sale compre con seguridad soy muy delicado con mis compras y quede fino ciando vi los paquetes

Reviews.Title: Information
Reviews.Author: Yornan Olaya
Reviews.Content: Hello Good Day, I am writing to see if the phone that you are selling is from AT&T; or T-Mobile,Thanks

Reviews.Title: Satisfecho mas no en un 100%
Reviews.Author: María Suárez
Reviews.Content: El teléfono llego en perfectas condiciones mas los accesorios fueron sustituidos todos incluyendo la bateria por partes genéricas cuando en realidad yo pedí un artículo nuevo y orignial de resto el celular funciona pero me parece de mal gusto que envien lo que no es incluso ni la memoria MicroSD la trajo pero esta gente se aprovecha de que uno esta comprando desde el extranjero y no tiene muchas posibilidades de reclamar!

Reviews.Title: El equipo vino mal
Reviews.Author: Antonio
Reviews.Content: Lamentablemente el equipo vino bloqueado pero estoy probando si desbloqueandolo funciona.Este vendedror es falso y la verdad es que no me gusta que pase mas esto

ProductInfo.Name: Blackberry Curve 3G 9300 Unlocked GSM SmartPhone with 2 MP Camera, Wi-Fi, GPS, Bluetooth - Unlocked Phone - International Version - Graphite Grey
